Welcome to the 100 Days Of Code challenge! You are about to start a journey of 100 days of learning code. 100 days of commitment that will help you reach your goals. Read the rules carefully Commit to the challenge publicly. Code for a minimum of one hour each day. Share your progress daily, with #100DaysOfCode. Each day, try to encourage at least two people participating in the challenge. Your mental and physical health is your priority. Allow yourself days of rest. Time to commit
Time to commit Let\'s start! How do you want to be called? It can be anything you want. It\'s just to personalize your experience. What are you hoping to achieve during this challenge? Say what you want to achieve during this challenge. It will be shown on your dashboard to keep you on track. You can edit it later, learning is not a straight path. Start from day:" Start date"
About us I am an experienced Android developer specializing in Kotlin Multiplatform, with 3 years of expertise in building and maintaining high-traffic B2B and B2C apps. I\'ve worked on notable projects like Dakar, Tour de France, and Total, focusing on delivering user-friendly and reliable mobile solutions. I leverage modern tools such as Compose and Koin to create impactful apps available on the Play Store. My apps https://alphaomardiallo.com History Learn Rules About us
